name: Peeb Adventures! - PRE ALPHA
description:
This is the pre-alpha copy of Peeb Adventures. It doesn't feature an options menu or pause menu, the environment is not fully finished, and some mechanics are not fully refined as intended. I'm mostly releasing this so those who are interested in the game can get a chance to check out the project in its early stages and see how things are going.

CREDITS:

Tim https://twitter.com/BokuNoAcchan

The Void Theme, Usurper's Theme -

SCHEMEGRAPPLEINTERACTMOVELOOKJUMPKeyboard + MouseLeft-MouseEWASDMouseSpacebarXbox ControllerLeft TriggerXLeft Analog Stick
Right Analog StickA

DISCLAIMER: THIS IS AN EXTREMELY EARLY PRE-ALPHA COPY THAT IS BEING RELEASED DUE TO COMPLICATIONS ON MY END. I APOLOGIZE FOR ANY APPARENT LACK OF QUALITY.
